column1: Kata Robata////Whoever was the hostess on Feb 13th needs to be re-trained or fired. Called in on that day to make omakase reservations and was supposedly put down tonight for one. I made it extremely clear that I wanted it to be an omakase reservation and she made it clear that it was an omakase reservation as well. Got called today to confirm our reservation
column2: only to find out it was never an omakase reservation. Too bad I guess. My party was anticipating this dinner for almost two weeks. Needless to say
column3: I won't be trying to make a reservation again because I don't know how deep this idiocy runs in the establishment
